name: Moon Lander
description:
Pilot your Moon Lander spacecraft from one landing pad to the next! Each time you land successfully, your score will increase and your Moon Lander will be refueled. The amount of points earned and fuel refilled varies from landing pad to landing pad. As your game progresses, your landings become more challenging and you will need to skillfully conserve your fuel.

Get the highest score possible using accelerometer technology! Record your high scores on your own iPhone/iTouch or submit to our website and view high scores worldwide.

- Three skill levels
- Accelerometer technology
- Record high scores
